dct_title_s: Map showing the location of battle fields of Virginia
dct_alternative_sm: Map showing the location of battle fields of Virginia
dct_description_sm: Shows Civil War battlefields (1861-1865), Chesapeake & Ohio Railroad lines, distinguishing between those which are pre-war and post-war, other railroads during the war, plank roads, turnpikes, other roads and light houses. Dimensions: 50 x 60 centimeters, on sheet 53 x 63 centimeters
